title: Graves Penta 10k Behind with enemy baron / x3 dragon buffed

embed.description: Graves Penta 10k Behind with enemy baron / x3 dragon buffed Moral of story? NEVER GIVE UP! Follow my adventure as a climb the ladder

body:
Hey guys, another snippet of my ranked adventure.

Always remain positive, never give up.

Every loss is a learning experience and every win a reward for your efforts.

Have a great day.

replies.body:
Beat drops at 13 seconds, nothing happens. :(

Other then a few iffy looking E's the play is good, my debate is how far behind YOU were with respect to the enemy team, not just your allys.

Yea i E'd twice abit funny, the first one for me was i went too far ahead at the start, and got ahead of the frontline.. its a habbit i'm really trying to work on, the second was E'ing towards leona for the kill.. i could of angled that differently.

OH CRAP! honestly didn't think about the music. I will make sure next time i improve on my music sync! xD

Good flash Q onto cait.

keep up the good work mate.

how do you record your game xD
-noob

Nice work mang. I love me some {{champion:104}} , my favorite ADC to play, I just can't stand the right click to win champs unless they're {{champion:67}}.

Your opinion: {{item:3031}} or {{item:3087}} as first item after boots?

Hi, glad you like the video,

imo i think boots aren't ideal to buy first unless vsing mobility or not enough gold for a BF and have to buy pickaxe+boots . and i never really upgrade them until i have a core item.

{{item:3031}} is always first 

{{item:3087}} is situational for graves.

just my opinion but it works for me
Yeah I normally buy {{item:1038}} and then {{item:1001}} and then finish {{item:3031}} as my first item. The small amount of movespeed really helps secure those kills on more kitey champs.
